job.title: Data Scientist

developments clinical and regulatory success We pride ourselves on resourcefulness collaboration and our ability to tackle  Pharmas most demanding problems and look for exceptional talent to help us growppbrppstrongJob SummarystrongppbrppWe are looking for a Data Scientist that will help us discover the information hidden in vast amounts of data and help us make more intelligent decisions to deliver even better productsnbspppAs a Data Scientist and Statistician you will work with a growing multidisciplinary team of Data Scientists Engineers and Solutions Experts with deep domain expertise working to develop new skills and workflows to solve realworld problems of the pharma and healthcare domain You will have the opportunity to work with unique healthcare data sets that cover all phases of the PharmaHealthcare industryppYour responsibilities will be to apply data mining techniques statistical analysis and build highquality prediction systems integrated with our product You will be helping to ensure that our models are accurate and parsimonious You will also help to characterize interpret and share the results we achieve in our pharmahealthcare research
